text: Joana Raspall i Juanola (1 July 1913 â€“ 4 December 2013) was a Spanish writer and librarian. She was born in Barcelona on 1 July 1913. Juanola died on 4 December 2013 from natural causes, aged 100. ==References== ==Other websites== *Joana Raspall at escriptors.cat Category:1913 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Librarians Category:Spanish centenarians Category:Writers from Barcelona
